categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic starships

nodes.text: Starway was group of two Transports used by the Rebel Alliance during the Galactic Civil War. Starway 1 & 2 were a part of two other groups of starships attempting to flee Calamari Cruiser Lulsla before it succumbed to wounds dealt by the Galactic Empire during the Aftermath of Hoth.
